      • charToByte

        public static boolean charToByte(byte[] bytes,
                                 int offset,
                                 char val)
        Store the object to the byte array.
        パラメータ:
        bytes - byte array to store the object.
        offset - the offset of the byte array.
        val - the object to store.
        戻り値:
        whether succeed or not.

      • hexDump

        public static void hexDump(byte[] bytes,
                           int len)
        Simple hex dump
        パラメータ:
        bytes - dumped byte objects.
        len - dumped length from the head of bytes object.
